body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Brochures              Brochures       Craters of the Moon National Monument and Preserve (General Information) General Information is also available in the following languages (PDF): Reserva y Monumento Natural Nacional Cráteres de la Luna (Spanish) Monument National et Réserve (French) Mond Krater (German) I Crateri Lunari (Italian) НациональныйПамятникиЗаповедникКратерыЛуны (Russian) 크레이터스오브문네셔널모뉴멘트와프리저브(Korean) 月面環形火山口國家紀念區及保護區 (Traditional Chinese) 月面环形火山口国家纪念区及保护区 (Simplified Chinese) Craters of the Moon (Vietnamese) 月のクレーター国立公園 (Japanese)      Information is also available on the following topics (PDF): Bird Checklist Broken Top Loop Trail Guide Camping Near Craters Geology Goodale's Cutoff Hiking Trails North End Trail Accessibility Weather and Climate White Nose Syndrome Wilderness Wildlife Checklist Winter Activities
